WonderkidAnswered on 10 Apr 2019How much do you spend in a year?It doesn't have to be big ticket expenses; your monthly expenses (phone bills, groceries, Grab, public transport, movie tickets, dining out, etc.) will all add up.A one-way Business Class ticket to Hong Kong costs 30,500 miles.At the optimal 4 mile / dollar strategy, it'll cost $7,625 worth of spending.That's $635 / month, or $165 lesser than the $800 minimum spend required for OCBC 365.How to get 4 mile / dollar:  https://milelion.com/credit-cards/guide/0 comments1
